151.title: The Comics Journal
notes: The Comics Journal. -- Bethel, CT [etc.] : Fantagraphics, 1977- . -- ill. ; 28 cm. -- Began with no. 32 (Jan. 1977) -- Continues: Nostalgia Journal. -- Periodical about comics. -- LIBRARY HAS: no. 32-303 (1977-2019). -- Call no.: PN6700.C62

Note: Brief contents for those issues of this periodical which were indexed by Library staff (issues 140 to 278) are given here. For earlier issues, including the Nostalgia Journal no. 2-31 and in general for author and subject entries for all issues, the indexing is dispersed throughout the Reading Room Index. For best access please return to the A to Z index screen and search for the name, title, or topic that is of interest.
